html:
2025-0504
2025-06-09GACSpecial Economic Measures ActRegulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Extremist Settler Violence) Regulations Regulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Extremist Settler Violence) Regulations in order to add two (2) individuals to the Schedule of the Regulations, directly or indirectly facilitating, supporting, providing funding for or contributing to the use of violence by Israeli extremist settlers against Palestinian civilians or their property in the occupied Palestinian territories, prohibiting them from transacting business with individuals and businesses in Canada, and freezing their assets unless otherwise authorized by the Minister of the Foreign Affairs.Registration: SOR/2025-0137 Publication Date: 2025-07-02
subject: Regulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Extremist Settler Violence) Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Extremist Settler Violence) Regulations in order to add two (2) individuals to the Schedule of the Regulations, directly or indirectly facilitating, supporting, providing funding for or contributing to the use of violence by Israeli extremist settlers against Palestinian civilians or their property in the occupied Palestinian territories, prohibiting them from transacting business with individuals and businesses in Canada, and freezing their assets unless otherwise authorized by the Minister of the Foreign Affairs.
